scripts.download-notes: rm -rf tmp-notes && git clone https://github.com/chiubaca/notes tmp-notes
scripts.move-notes: cp -r tmp-notes/permanent-notes/ apps/chiubaca.com/permanent-notes/ && cp -r tmp-notes/attachments/* apps/chiubaca.com/public/
scripts.test:node-env: echo "Current PATH: $PATH" && echo "Node location: $(which node)" && echo "Node version: $(node -v)"
